    • Method Detail

      • createEpisode

        @PostMapping(value="/episodes")
 @Timed
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\"ROLE_ADMIN\")")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Episode> createEpisode(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                 @Valid Episode episode)
                                                                                                                                                          throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        POST /episodes : Create a new episode.
        Parameters:
        episode - the episode to create
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 201 (Created) and with body the new episode, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the episode has already an ID
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect

      • updateEpisode

        @PutMapping(value="/episodes")
 @Timed
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\"ROLE_ADMIN\")")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Episode> updateEpisode(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                @Valid Episode episode)
        PUT /episodes : Updates an existing episode.
        Parameters:
        episode - the episode to update
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the updated episode, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the episode is not valid, or with status 500 (Internal Server Error) if the episode couldn't be updated

      • getAllEpisodes

        @GetMapping(value="/episodes")
 @Timed
public java.util.List<Episode> getAllEpisodes()
        GET /episodes : get all the episodes.
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and the list of episodes in body

      • getEpisode

        @GetMapping(value="/episodes/{id}")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Episode> getEpisode(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                 java.lang.Long id)
        GET /episodes/:id : get the episode by "id"
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the episode to retrieve
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the episode, or with status 404 (Not Found)

      • getEpisodeFromSeries

        @GetMapping(value="/series/{year}/{name}/season/{seasonNumber}/episode/{episodeNumber}")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Episode> getEpisodeFromSeries(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.Integer year,
                                                                                                                                                                                @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                                                                                @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.Integer seasonNumber,
                                                                                                                                                                                @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.Integer episodeNumber)
        GET /series/:year/:name/season/:seasonNumber/episode/:episodeNumber : get the episode from series and season.
        Parameters:
        year - the year of the series of episode to retrieve
        name - the name of the series of episode to retrieve
        seasonNumber - the number of the season of episode to retrieve
        episodeNumber - the number of episode to retrieve
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the episode, or with status 404 (Not Found)

      • deleteEpisode

        @DeleteMapping(value="/episodes/{id}")
 @Timed
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\"ROLE_ADMIN\")")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> deleteEpisode(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.Long id)
        DELETE /episodes/:id : delete episode by "id"
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the episode to delete
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK)
